questList.questDescription: The Shadows of Twilight whisper of an ethereal menace haunting the dark-dirt paths. Decide whether to vanquish or ally with Zephyrion the Wraithcaller to progress through this eerie realm.
Unite with Netherwing the Spectral Serpent to unlock the secrets of Twilight Shadows and receive the precious Amulet of Healing.
Embark on a journey to defeat Shadewraith the Soul Harvester in the heart of Shadows of Twilight. Earn the Amulet of Alliance as a mark of your victory.
Navigate the chilling Eclipse Enclave and face the decision to either unite with Frostclaw the Ice Serpent or eliminate the icy threat to advance to the next level.
Embrace the Twilight resonance with Lunara the Twilight Enchantress. Unite with her to receive the mystical Amulet of Healing.
Challenge and defeat Scorchwing the Flame Herald in Eclipse Enclave. Claim the Amulet of Alliance to strengthen your resolve.
Confront the ultimate darkness within Abyssal Veil by defeating Xyraphas the Shadowed, the Ephemeral Void Stalker. Victory shall bring light back to Aetheria.
Forge an alliance with Pyroclast the Molten Sentinel in the fiery pits of Abyssal Veil. Receive the Amulet of Healing as a token of unity.
Seek out Nihilus the Shadowflame Revenant in the depths of Abyssal Veil. Defeat this formidable foe and claim the Amulet of Alliance.
